about.title: Share Expenses Effortlessly
about.subtitle: Intuitive, Clean, and Completely Free. No Ads, Ever.
about.motivationText:
While SplitWise has been a popular tool for managing shared expenses, its recent shift toward a cluttered interface, increased advertisements, and premium feature restrictions has frustrated many users.
We created iSplit.app as a refreshing alternative — offering a completely free, intuitive, and streamlined solution for managing shared costs with friends and family.

getStarted.title: No Registration
getStarted.short: Get started instantly - just add expenses and participants, and share the link
getStarted.description:
Start splitting expenses immediately with zero friction.
No account creation, app downloads, or verification codes needed.
getStarted.step1: Create a group and add participants
getStarted.step3: Share the group link with friends

noAds.title: Ad-Free Experience
noAds.description: Enjoy a clean, distraction-free interface that keeps you focused on managing your shared expenses efficiently.

visualBalances.short: See exactly who owes what with intuitive charts and balance summaries

description.charts: Visualize debts and credits at a glance with clear charts

iosApp.title: Native iOS App
iosApp.short: Experience seamless integration with our dedicated iOS application
iosApp.description: Download our native iOS app for the best mobile experience, featuring direct link handling and push notifications for new expenses.

easySharing.title: Effortless Collaboration
easySharing.short: Invite friends with a simple link—they join instantly with one click
easySharing.description: Share your expense group with a single link. Friends can join immediately without any registration or setup hassles.

powerWebApp.short: Install iSplit.app directly on your device for a native app experience
powerWebApp.description: Transform iSplit.app into a native-like application on your device, complete with push notifications and offline capabilities.
